channel.title: CVE Feed for barpachuk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for barpachuk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6810|2024-08-02T08:42:07.461Z -- barpachuk -- clickcease%20click%20fraud%20protection
item.description: The ClickCease Click Fraud Protection plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to an improper capability check on the get_settings function in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author access and above, to retrieve the plugin's configured API keys.

item.title: CVE-2023-6810|2024-06-04T17:17:19.410Z -- barpachuk -- clickcease%20click%20fraud%20protection
item.description: The ClickCease Click Fraud Protection plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to an improper capability check on the get_settings function in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author access and above, to retrieve the plugin's configured API keys.
